meanings.definition: To go down on one or both knees.
meanings.sent1: The knight kneels before the king.
meanings.sent2: She always kneels to tie her shoelaces.
meanings.sent3: The puppy kneels to beg for treats.
meanings.sent4: The tree kneels under the weight of the snow.
meanings.sent5: The student kneels to pick up a fallen pencil.

meanings.definition: To be in a position where one or both knees are on the ground.
meanings.sent1: The gardener kneels to plant flowers in the garden.
meanings.sent2: He often kneels to examine the tiny insects on the grass.
meanings.sent3: The toddler kneels to play with his toys on the floor.
meanings.sent4: The soldier kneels to take cover during the battle.
meanings.sent5: The athlete kneels to stretch before the race.
